feed.title: Google Cloud: Config Connector
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Config Connector

entry.content: Config Connector version 1.132.1 is now available.
entry.title: Announcement: Announcement

entry.content:
Reconciliation Improvements:
* [SpannerInstance](https://cloud.google.com/config-connector/docs/reference/resource-docs/spanner/spannerinstance) + You can opt-in the direct controller by adding the `alpha.cnrm.cloud.google.com/reconciler: direct` annotation to the `SpannerInstance` resource`. + Direct controller is opt-in if using the following fields: - `spec.labels` - `spec.defaultBackupScheduleType` - `spec.edition` - `spec.autoscalingConfig`
entry.title: Changed: SpannerInstance reconciliation

entry.content: Config Connector version 1.132.0 is now available.

entry.summary: New beta resources are available for Speech-to-Text and Vertex AI, including SpeechCustomClass, SpeechPhraseSet, SpeechRecognizer, VertexAINotebooksInstance, and VertexAIMetadataStore.
entry.title: Feature: New Beta Resources for Speech and Vertex AI

entry.summary: New Alpha resources are available, including OrgPolicyPolicy, OrgPolicyCustomConstraint, SpeechRecognizer, and StorageAnywhereCache.
entry.title: Changed: New Alpha Resources Available

entry.content:
New Fields:
* [SpannerInstance](https://cloud.google.com/config-connector/docs/reference/resource-docs/spanner/spannerinstance) For opt-in direct controller, + Added `spec.labels` field. + Added `spec.defaultBackupScheduleType` field. * [SecretManagerSecret](https://cloud.google.com/config-connector/docs/reference/resource-docs/secretmanager/secretmanagersecret) For opt-in direct controller, + Added `spec.labels` field.
entry.summary: New fields `spec.labels` and `spec.defaultBackupScheduleType` have been added to SpannerInstance, and `spec.labels` has been added to SecretManagerSecret for opt-in direct controller.
entry.title: Feature: New fields for SpannerInstance and SecretManagerSecret
